• Regensensor

• Handy / Telefon Freisprecheinrichtung Comfort mit induktiver Ladefunktion

• Streaming & Internet

• Komfortsitze
• Sitzheizung
• Bedienungselemente in der 2. Sitzreihe für Climatronic

• Ambientelicht

• Kofferraumnetz

trans:
• Rain sensor
• Tire pressure control
• Rear view camera
• Traffic jam assistant
• Top tether child seat anchorage at the rear
• Front area monitoring system Front Assist
• Traffic sign recognition
• Immobilizer
Audio & communication
• Navigation system
• Comfort phone/smartphone hands-free system with inductive charging function
• Voice control
• Streaming & internet
• 8 loudspeakers
• USB audio interface - 2x front, 2x rear
• DAB+ digital radio reception
• Mirror Link
Comfort
• Height-adjustable driver/front passenger seats
• Electric driver's seat with memory
• Driving profile selection
• Comfort seats
• Seat heating
• Controls in the 2nd row of seats for Climatronic
• Climatronic 3-zone
• Automatically dimming interior mirror
• Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) with follow to stop
• Dynamic steering
• Electric auxiliary air heater
• Keyless Entry - Keyless Advanced
• Folding table on the back of the front seats
• Lumbar support electric
• Servotronic
• Sunblind
Interior
• Seat covers in fabric / imitation leather
• Virtual Cockpit
• 5 seats
• Ambient light
• Sliding luggage compartment cover
• Luggage compartment lighting
• Luggage compartment net
• Multifunction leather steering wheel, heated, with shift paddles
• Net partition
• Split-folding rear seat back with center armrest
• Variable loading floor concept
Exterior
• Foldable trailer coupling with electric release
